lead_paragraph: Carlos Alberto, who scored one of the greatest goals in World Cup history while captaining Brazil to glory in the 1970 final against Italy, died on Tuesday, aged 72.

headline.print_headline: Factbox-Tributes to Former Brazil Captain Carlos Alberto
headline.main: Factbox-Tributes to Former Brazil Captain Carlos Alberto
